title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
**Embrace the Essence of Autumn with The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle**

**Product Name:**
The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each

**Product Overview:**
Celebrate the cozy comfort of fall with The Republic of Tea's exclusive Fall Apple Teas Bundle. This heartwarming duo includes the Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Teas, each with 36 tea bags to indulge your senses and wrap you in the warmth of the season. Savor the nostalgic flavors of a classic autumnal treat, all with the convenience of a caffeine-free cup that can be enjoyed any time of day or night.

**Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea:**
- **Description:** Revel in a naturally caffeine-free blend that captures the quintessential flavors of apple cider, enriched with cinnamon and cloves.
- **Ingredients:** Apple pieces, Cinnamon, Orange peel, Rose hips, Berry leaves, Natural flavors, Ginger root, Cloves, Citric acid, Cardamom seeds.
- **Caffeine-Free:** Yes

**Caramel Apple Herbal Tea:**
- **Description:** Delight in a caffeine-free concoction of sweet apples and creamy vanilla infused with the distinctive taste of South African Rooibos.
- **Ingredients:** Rooibos, Apple bits, Natural apple and caramel flavors, Vanilla extract.
- **Caffeine-Free:** Yes

**Steeping Instructions:**
- **Water Temperature:** Rolling boil.
- **Amount of Water:** 6 oz per tea bag.
- **Steep Time:** 5-7 minutes for the perfect brew.
- **Additional Tip:** Don't discard your used tea bags! They make a wonderful addition to compost or soil, contributing to a greener planet.

**Bundle Details:**
- **Count:** 36 tea bags per flavor, ensuring you have plenty to enjoy and share.
- **Ideal For:** These teas are perfect as an accompaniment to the harvest season, as a dessert tea, or simply as a relaxing treat to enjoy the fall vibes.

**Product Type:**
Herbal Tea Bundle – A symphony of flavors that echoes the spirit of fall.

**Indulge in the Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle by The Republic of Tea and transform your tea time into a celebration of the harvest. Order now and steep yourself in the flavors of the season!**

**Embrace the Essence of Autumn with The Republic of Tea Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle**

Indulge in the warmth and comfort of the harvest season with The Republic of Tea's exclusive Fall Apple Teas - a delightful pairing of Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. Each bundle contains 36 count tea bags of each flavor, perfect for savoring the cozy moments of autumn.

**Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea**
Experience the quintessential taste of fall with our Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea. This naturally caffeine-free blend combines the classic flavors of apple cider with a touch of spice, featuring ingredients such as apple pieces, cinnamon, orange peel, rose hips, berry leaves, natural flavors, ginger root, cloves, citric acid, and cardamom seeds. Each sip transports you to a festive fall afternoon, with the comfort of cinnamon and the warmth of cloves enveloping you in a blanket of seasonal cheer.

**Caramel Apple Herbal Tea**
Enchant your palate with the sweet and luscious Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. Also caffeine-free, this blend marries the sweetness of apples and vanilla with the smoothness of South African Rooibos. Ingredients like rooibos, apple bits, natural apple and caramel flavors, and vanilla extract create a dessert-like infusion that soothes and delights. It's the perfect guilt-free treat to enjoy any time of day.

**Steeping Instructions**
Both of these exceptional teas are best enjoyed when prepared with care. Use 6 oz of water at a rolling boil and steep the tea bags for 5-7 minutes to unlock the full spectrum of flavors. After enjoying your tea, continue the cycle of nature by adding used tea bags to your compost or enriching the soil of your garden.

**Ideal for Any Occasion**
Whether you're looking for a comforting companion to a crisp fall morning, a soothing sip on a cool evening, or a delightful dessert tea to round off a meal, this Herbal Tea Bundle is a perfect choice. It's also a thoughtful gift for tea lovers and those who revel in the flavors of autumn.

Bring the harvest right to your teacup with The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle. Order now and wrap yourself in the festive flavors of the season!

### Product Listing: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle

**Product Name:**  
The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each

**Product Description:**  
Savor the essence of autumn with The Republic of Tea’s exclusive Fall Apple Teas Bundle. This limited-edition collection features two delightful flavors: Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. Each blend is carefully crafted to capture the cozy warmth of fall in a cup, offering a perfect caffeine-free treat for any time of the day.

**Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea:**
- **Description:** Indulge in the comfort of home with every sip of this naturally caffeine-free blend, reminiscent of freshly-pressed apple cider infused with a harmonious mix of cinnamon and cloves.
- **Ingredients:** Apple pieces, Cinnamon, Orange peel, Rose hips, Berry leaves, Natural flavors, Ginger root, Cloves, Citric acid, Cardamom seeds.
- **Caffeine-Free:** Yes

**Caramel Apple Herbal Tea:**
- **Description:** Enjoy the sweet taste of autumn with this caffeine-free blend, combining the flavors of ripe apples, rich caramel, and smooth vanilla, all grounded in the distinctive taste of South African Rooibos.
- **Ingredients:** Rooibos, Apple bits, Natural apple and caramel flavors, Vanilla extract.
- **Caffeine-Free:** Yes

**Steeping Instructions:**
- **Water Temperature:** Bring water to a rolling boil for the most flavorful infusion.
- **Amount of Water:** Use 6 oz of water per tea bag for the ideal balance.
- **Steep Time:** Allow the tea to steep for 5-7 minutes to achieve perfect strength and aroma.
- **Additional Tips:** After enjoying your tea, contribute to a greener planet by adding used tea bags to compost or soil.

**Bundle Details:**
- **Count:** Each flavor comes with 36 tea bags, providing you with plenty of opportunities to delight in these autumn-inspired teas.
- **Ideal For:** These teas are the perfect accompaniment to the harvest season, serving as a splendid dessert tea or a comforting beverage for chilly evenings.

**Embrace the flavors of fall and make your tea time a festive experience with The Republic of Tea’s Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle. Order now and steep yourself in the seasonal bliss of apple orchards and cozy spices!**

**The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle – Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea – 36 Tea Bags Each**

Cozy up with the warm, inviting flavors of autumn with The Republic of Tea's Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle. This exclusive collection features two delightful caffeine-free herbal teas: Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple, each with 36 tea bags to savor and enjoy throughout the season.

**Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea (36 Tea Bags)**
Embrace the essence of fall with every sip of this naturally caffeine-free blend. The Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea combines the quintessential flavors of apple cider with a warming mix of cinnamon and cloves. Each ingredient is carefully selected to create a harmonious infusion that tastes just like your favorite fall beverage. The full ingredient list includes:
- Apple Pieces
- Cinnamon
- Orange Peel
- Rose Hips
- Berry Leaves
- Natural Flavors
- Ginger Root
- Cloves
- Citric Acid
- Cardamom Seeds

**Caramel Apple Herbal Tea (36 Tea Bags)**
Dessert in a cup, our Caramel Apple Herbal Tea is a caffeine-free indulgence featuring the sweetness of ripe apples and the rich, creamy taste of caramel, complemented by the gentle, nutty notes of South African Rooibos. This delightful blend is perfect for those cozy evenings or as a guilt-free treat any time of the day. Its ingredients include:
- Rooibos
- Apple Bits
- Natural Apple and Caramel Flavors
- Vanilla Extract

**Steeping Instructions:**
To experience the full flavor of these limited-edition teas, simply steep with the following instructions:
- Water Temperature: Bring water to a rolling boil
- Amount of Water: Pour 6 oz over each tea bag
- Steep Time: Allow to steep for 5-7 minutes
- Additional Tip: Don't discard your used tea bags—add them to compost or soil to enrich your garden!

**Ideal For:**
These teas are the perfect accompaniment to the harvest season, pairing beautifully with cool weather and falling leaves. They also serve as a delightful dessert tea to end your meals on a sweet note.

**Bring home The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle today and celebrate the flavors of fall with each delicious cup.**

Embrace the essence of autumn with The Republic of Tea's Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle. Delight in the cozy warmth of Hot Apple Cider and the decadent sweetness of Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. With 36 count tea bags of each flavor, this bundle is perfect for savoring the season.

**Product Name:**
The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each

**Product Description:**

Indulge in the spirit of fall with two heartwarming herbal teas:

**Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea**
This naturally caffeine-free blend captures the classic flavors of apple cider, enhanced with a symphony of cinnamon, orange peel, rose hips, berry leaves, and warm spices like ginger root, cloves, and cardamom seeds. Each sip is a comforting reminder of crisp autumn days.

**Caramel Apple Herbal Tea**
Experience the sweetness of the harvest with this caffeine-free concoction. Sweet apples meld with creamy vanilla and the rich, earthy tones of South African Rooibos, creating a dessert-like infusion that's perfect for any time of day.

- Water Temperature: Bring to a rolling boil
- Amount of Water: 6 oz per tea bag
- Steep Time: 5-7 minutes to achieve the perfect brew
- Additional Tip: Don't discard your used tea bags! Add them to compost or enrich your garden soil with their natural goodness.

- This bundle is an ideal accompaniment to the harvest season, and its flavors make it a delightful dessert tea.

Savor the comforting flavors of fall with The Republic of Tea's Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas. Whether you're unwinding after a long day or hosting a festive autumn gathering, these teas provide the perfect blend of comfort and indulgence.

**The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle**

Indulge in the essence of autumn with The Republic of Tea's Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle, featuring two cozy and caffeine-free selections: Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. Each bundle contains 36 count tea bags of each flavor, perfect for savoring throughout the season.

**Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea (36 Tea Bags):**
Experience the warm embrace of our Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea. This naturally caffeine-free blend captures the quintessential taste of apple cider with a harmonious mix of apple pieces, cinnamon, and cloves. Infused with orange peel, rose hips, berry leaves, natural flavors, ginger root, citric acid, and cardamom seeds, this tea offers a comforting cup that's reminiscent of your favorite fall moments.

**Caramel Apple Herbal Tea (36 Tea Bags):**
Enchant your palate with the sweet and soothing Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. Another caffeine-free delight, this blend combines the taste of ripe sweet apples and smooth vanilla with the robust, earthy notes of South African Rooibos. Apple bits and natural apple and caramel flavors come together to create a dessert-like infusion that's perfect for any time of day.

**Steeping Instructions:**
To achieve the perfect cup, start with fresh, cold water brought to a rolling boil. Use 6 oz of water per tea bag and steep for 5-7 minutes. For an eco-friendly tip, repurpose your used tea bags by adding them to compost or enriching your garden soil.

**Bundle Details:**
- Count: 72 total tea bags (36 of each flavor)
- Caffeine-Free: Yes
- Ideal For: Accompanying the harvest season, dessert pairings, or a comforting solo sip
- Additional Info: Each tea captures the essence of fall with their unique apple-inspired blends

Whether you're hosting a festive gathering or simply enjoying a quiet, crisp evening, The Republic of Tea's Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle is the perfect companion. Embrace the season with each sip of these heartwarming herbal teas.

**Product Title:**
The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle – Hot Apple Cider & Caramel Apple Herbal Tea – 36 Tea Bags Each

**Product Overview:**
Indulge in the essence of fall with 36 tea bags of each variety, perfect for savoring the crisp, cozy moments of the season. Whether you're looking for an accompaniment to the harvest festivities or a delightful dessert tea, this bundle brings the orchard to your teacup.

**Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea:**
Experience the classic flavors of autumn with this naturally caffeine-free blend. Each cup is a harmonious mix of apple pieces, cinnamon, orange peel, rose hips, berry leaves, natural flavors, ginger root, cloves, citric acid, and cardamom seeds. It's like sipping on a mug of freshly made apple cider, without the caffeine jitters.

**Caramel Apple Herbal Tea:**
Savor the taste of sweet apples and rich vanilla, perfectly balanced with the naturally caffeine-free South African Rooibos. This blend combines rooibos, apple bits, natural apple and caramel flavors, and vanilla extract to create a dessert-like infusion that's guilt-free and full of flavor.

**Steeping Instructions:**
For the perfect cup, bring water to a rolling boil and use 6 oz per tea bag. Steep for 5-7 minutes and let the rich, full-bodied flavors envelop you. As a bonus, you can add the used tea bags to your compost or soil, making this a gift to both you and the environment.

**Key Features:**
- Two delicious fall-inspired flavors: Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple
- Each flavor comes with 36 tea bags, ensuring you have plenty to enjoy and share
- Naturally caffeine-free, perfect for evening relaxation
- Easy-to-follow steeping instructions for a perfect cup every time
- Eco-friendly packaging with a suggestion to compost used tea bags
